UniprotID	Q8TCD5
Accession	Q8TCD5;Q96HS6;Q9NP82
EntryName	NT5C_HUMAN
ProteinName	5'(3')-deoxyribonucleotidase, cytosolic type (EC 3.1.3.-) (Cytosolic 5',3'-pyrimidine nucleotidase) (Deoxy-5'-nucleotidase 1) (dNT-1)
GeneName	NT5C DNT1 UMPH2
Length	201
Function	Dephosphorylates the 5' and 2'(3')-phosphates of deoxyribonucleotides, with a preference for dUMP and dTMP, intermediate activity towards dGMP, and low activity towards dCMP and dAMP.
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm
